title: Enhancements to the element
description: The permission HTML element is no longer void and also has support for icons.

title: Automatically create passkeys in Google Password Manager on Chrome desktop
description: Use the cross-device capabilities of the Digital Credentials API to present digital credentials across devices.

title: Easy way to upload, transform and deliver files and images (Sponsored)
description: Managing media is a really difficult task if you try to do all of it yourself, especially if the media comes from other sources. The file can be submitted in any state and size, but what if you need something really specific? You can code it all yourself or you can use an awesome service […] The post Easy way to upload, transform and deliver files and images (Sponsored) appeared first on David Walsh Blog.
author: David Walsh

title: How to Download a YouTube Video or Channel
description: The ability to download media on the internet almost feels like a lost art. When I was in my teens, piracy of mp3s, movies, and just about everything else via torrents and apps like Kazaa, LimeWire, Napster, etc. was in full swing. These days sites use blob URLs and other means to prevent downloads. Luckily […] The post How to Download a YouTube Video or Channel appeared first on David Walsh Blog.
author: David Walsh

title: You can style alt text like any other text
description: Clever, clever that Andy Bell. He shares a technique for displaying image alt text when the image fails to load. Well, more precisely, it's a technique to apply styles to the alt when the image doesn't load, offering a nice UI fallback for what would otherwise be a busted-looking error. You can style alt text like any other text originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
author: Geoff Graham

title: SVG to CSS Shape Converter
description: Shape master Temani Afif has what might be the largest collection of CSS shapes on the planet with all the tools to generate them on the fly. There’s a mix of clever techniques he’s typically used to make those shapes, … SVG to CSS Shape Converter originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
author: Geoff Graham
